content:
Yes, there are many more suppliers of magnetic sensors for doors and windows. Here are a few more:

1. Digi-Key Electronics - <https://www.digikey.com/en/products/filter/magnetic-reed-switches/521>
2. Mouser Electronics - <https://www.mouser.com/Sensors/Magnetic-Sensors/Reed-Switches-Magnetic-Sensors/_/N-5gej?P=1z0wqgw>
3. Allied Electronics & Automation - <https://www.alliedelec.com/category/sensors/magnetic-sensors/reed-switches/70134771>

These websites offer a wide selection of magnetic sensors, including reed switches, which can be used in open/close sensor integration. Prices may vary depending on the type and quantity of sensors needed.
